title: He Is Playing More Than The Organ
itunes:title: He Is Playing More Than The Organ
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, My mother is 70 years old, but she is the new 70s woman. She’s a size 8 and her skin is as smooth as can be and she doesn't have one wrinkle or gray hair in sight. She's a well-known, respected member of our church and she’s active in church ministries. My mother and I have always had a great mom and daughter relationship, until recently. We have been having a lot of problems, since my mother started dating the organist at our church, who is only 31 years old...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, My mother is 70 years old, but she is the new 70s woman. She’s a size 8 and her skin is as smooth as can be and she doesn't have one wrinkle or gray hair in sight. She's a well-known, respected member of our church and she’s active in church ministries. My mother and I have always had a great mom and daughter relationship, until recently. We have been having a lot of problems, since my mother started dating the organist at our church, who is only 31 years old...............
